DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial confirm efficacy human brown seaweed powder explore dose-response relationship compare two different dos . The primary endpoint incremental area curve ( iAUC , mmol*min/L ) blood glucose .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Brown Seaweed Powder Glycemic Control
DOC.criteria: Males female age 1845 Normoglycemic ( fast blood glucose < 5.6 mmol/L ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.529.9 kg/m2 Able consume bread product Exclusion Criteria Fasting blood glucose > 5.6 mmol/L Systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Previous history cardiovascular disease , diabetes , liver kidney disease , inflammatory bowel disease , celiac disease , short bowel syndrome , malabsorptive syndrome , pancreatitis , gallbladder biliary disease Presence gastrointestinal disorder within past year Presence major gastrointestinal surgery Thyroid problem Smokers Consuming prescription nonprescription drug , herbal nutritional supplement know affect blood glucose could affect outcome study per investigator 's judgement Women currently pregnant lactating , use appropriate contraception method Excessive alcohol intake ( 2 drink per day 9 drink per week ) Allergic shellfish ( crab ) mollusc Weight gain loss least 10lbs previous three month
